name: Headspider
description:
Headspider is a top-down shooter about a head with spider legs!

You shoot in the opposite direction that you move!

Features:
- incredibly deep and lore rich story
- alien flesh orbs!
- pretty cool combat
- 9 levels
- an epic final boss that can be cheesed!

Thank you for playing my game! - kadable

Made in pico-8
